TopicTitle: Problems with loaded game - Captured Asteroid

Articles.Content:
Hi all.

I've been having some problems with saved games and asteroids.

Whenever I capture a previously undisturbed asteroid (i know it is because the mission requirements say so) an save the fame after that, if I load it later, the asteroid suddenly has been disturbed

This is a of nuissance, sine I'm unable to complete a capture asteroid mission unless i do all the mission at once. Is anybody having the same problem? Does anyone know how to change the asteroid status on the save file? (I dont want to start again the mission)

I'm using the following mods: mechjeb, kerbal engineer redux, kerbal alarm clock ans taskbar

Thanks in advance!

 

 

Edited February 12, 2018 by Iridar
There is a bug in version 1.3.1; see
